txt.en: Miruhir has asked you to move recovered flotsam from where it is stacked by the fence to Tregeth, who waits in town.\n\nCollect recovered flotsam.
Pick up the stack of planks in Iáphel
TBD thanks. These will become new winemaking barrels

'Ah, there's my delivery! It has been difficult to source quality wood as of late, so using recovered flotsam will help me keep up with production. Perhaps the wine aged in the barrels I'll make will be briny and taste of the sea, because that is what everyone wants -- salty wine.'
Carry the stack of planks to Tregeth in Iáphel
You have delivered the planks to Tregeth!

'Most of the wood being produced in Gondor is reserved for the rebuilding of homes and the construction of a new fleet of ships, or so I hear. This makes it hard to source wood for the barrels we need to store and age the wine. My clever cooper, Tregeth, has found a creative solution — reusing flotsam that has washed ashore. Some labourers from Lond Cirion brought some to the vineyard yesterday morning and le
